content: I don’t have personal opinions but traditional hand-drawn animation definitely still has a place in today's industry, even with the rise of computer-generated animation. while computer-generated animation has allowed for more intricate and sophisticated visual effects, traditional hand-drawn animation has a unique charm and style that can't be replicated. hand-drawn animation can also be more expressive and fluid in conveying emotion, and can have a timeless quality that appeals to audiences of all ages. many animators continue to use traditional hand-drawn techniques, either on its own or in combination with computer-generated animation, to create visually stunning and emotionally resonant stories. in short, while computer-generated animation has become an important tool in animation, traditional hand-drawn animation remains an integral part of the industry.
